compatibility.notes: The Sendmail-8.23 license is permissive and allows for integration with other software, but care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include copyright notices in source and binary redistributions.
Provide a copy of the license with redistributions.
State any changes made to the original source code.
license.name: Sendmail-8.23
obligations: Redistributions must qualify as 'freeware' or 'Open Source Software'.
Redistributions must be made at no charge beyond the reasonable cost of materials and delivery.
Redistributions must include a copy of the Source Code or an irrevocable offer to provide the Source Code.
Redistributions of Source Code must retain copyright notices and license terms.
Redistributions in binary form must reproduce copyright notice and license terms in documentation.
Must not use the names of Proofpoint, Inc. or the University of California for promotion without permission.
Must comply with conditions imposed by the University of California on certain embedded code.
